snippet.title: Highway 2000 Sega Saturn Intro + Gameplay [No Commentary]
snippet.description:
I have a ton of games in my backlog that I've either never played or played very little.  So I thought it might be fun to sample semi-random games and upload them so everyone can see how terrible I am at them!

So here we have a game called Highway 2000 for the Saturn.  It was developed by Genki and published in North America by Natsume in 1996.  This was my first time playing this game and I actually thought it was pretty good.  I could see myself trying to master all of the tracks in this one.  I didn't do very well in these races, but I think it's just a matter of understanding the handling and learning the tracks.  It felt a lot like Ridge Racer and while I don't think it'll top that one or some of the other great '90s arcade racers like Daytona USA, it's still a good one to check out if you're a fan of the genre.  I captured this video on a Saturn.

You can check out my full video game collection here:  http://www.completionator.com/Collection/Index/1
